name: Heroes Never Die (itch)
description:
Game Jam submission for the MixAndGameJam 2020

This rogue lite turn-based RPG is made with the idea of playing an adventurer who keeps delving into the depths of a dungeon, only to die and be revived again in town. What's causing this loop of adventuring and death? Why your adventurer? The only option you have is to delve into the depths once again and try to uncover the mysteries of this dungeon.

This was my first Game Jam submission
